comment.author: 29029178@N03
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Pubs of Australia, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 71290261@N05
comment._content: Discovered this pub in the late 60's when my boss sent me out to find a pub that had beer, during a beer strike. Trouble is after touring the city on foot I'd found a few pubs that had beer including the M&M, but was got bushed down in the wilds of  (what is now) Darling Harbour and didn't make it back to work. Happy days. The M&M didn't last long after that time.
